name: Space Cobra RetPixMod
description:
Space Cobra
RetPixMod!

Developed by MisterX

Do not forget to kick ass the pirates of the Guild, who will try to stop you! So let's get started!!!

• 3 episodes (7 levels) and 3 bosses are available!
• There are 3 playable characters in the game - they will be available as you progress through the game!
